sourcesContent:
import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {getNews} from "../../redux/News/selectors"; import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import {fetchNewsBegin} from "../../redux/News/actions"; const LatestItem = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const news = useSelector(getNews); useEffect(() =>{ dispatch(fetchNewsBegin()) },[]) return (
Latest Research
Weekly Brief
{news[0]?.headline.substring(0, 28)}
{news[0]?.summary.substring(0, 100)}...
Read the research
17 Feb
); }; export default LatestItem;
